page.title: 17MY DAY
page.content: 7:30 Get out of bed,get washed then get ready.Go down stairs and have my breakfast which is usually CORNFLAKES (with milk and sugar) and a cup of tea. 8:30 Set off for STANLEY COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL,I walk there. 8:50 I arrive at school. 9:00-9:15 Registration with my class 9:15-11:55 French,Environmental studies,Physics. I stay for school dinner we usually have chips,salad and meat.Cost 60p. 1:15-3:45 Geography,English and Biology.I go to my auntie's house after school because my mam is at work till 5:15 pm. I enjoy watching TV my favourite programmes are HE-MAN and THE KIDS OF DEGRASSI STREET.After tea I sometimes go to the roller disco at STANLEY YOUTH CENTRE.
